question: 恐ろしい
sourceMnemonic: This is a single kanji with an <ja>い</ja> on the end, meaning you know it's probably an adjective. What's the adjective form of <kanji>fear</kanji>? When you feel fear, you think something is <vocabulary>scary</vocabulary>.
sourceReadingMnemonic: Since this word consists of a kanji with hiragana attached, you can bet that it will use the kun'yomi reading. You didn't learn that reading with this kanji, so here's a mnemonic to help you: How <vocabulary>scary</vocabulary> is it? It's <reading>Oh so</reading> (<ja>おそ</ja>) scary!
